reference.shortdesc:
The parmname element identifies the name of an API parameter.
Do we want to broaden the definition? I think this element is used more broadly than just API parameters. In fact, the example in this topic shows it used as a parameter to a command.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The parmname is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the programming domain module.
